PPLoc: http://www.fellowes.com/us/en/Misc/Pages/privacy-policy.aspx; HR policy on corporate Intranet (see link below)
activities: (1) Customer data: collecting names, addresses, email and similar data from customers registering products, agreeing to receive online newsletters and/or participate in market research studies. (2) Employment and human resources data for individuals and in aggregate: data collected that is report-based, such as  rosters of employees or headcount totals by country, as well as organization charts and the like.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Consumer data such as name, address, email and items purchased.Human resource data transmitted on-line via a Human Resource Information System.
recoursemech: Cooperation and compliance with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
